    • Method Detail

      • setMacrostateManager

        public void setMacrostateManager(MacrostateManager m)

      • doStepInternal

        public void doStepInternal()
        Method to select and perform an elementary Monte Carlo move. The type of move performed is chosen from all MCMoves that have been added to the integrator. Each MCMove has associated with it a (unnormalized) frequency, which when weighed against the frequencies given the other MCMoves, determines the likelihood that the move is selected. After completing move, fires an MCMove event if there are any listeners.
        Overrides:
        doStepInternal in class IntegratorMC

      • setWeightUpdateInterval

        public void setWeightUpdateInterval(int i)
        Sets the number of doStep calls between updating of weights.

      • getWeightUpdateInterval

        public int getWeightUpdateInterval()
        Accessor method for number of doStep calls between updating of weights.
